```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

mls_data <- read.csv("mls-salaries-2007.csv")

```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
mls_data |> 
  filter(position == "D") |> 
  select(position, base_salary, club) |> 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = position, 
                       y = base_salary, 
                       color = club)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  scale_y_continuous(labels=scales::dollar_format())
```
```{r}

  filter(position == "D")
```
